definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
see 考試卷|考试卷[kao3 shi4 juan4]

sentences.english: The teacher will look over our tests tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 老师明天批阅我们的试卷。

sentences.english: The guy next to me wrote him name at the top of the peper.
sentences.chinese: 坐在这旁边的那个人只在试卷顶端写了自己的名字。

sentences.english: Our teacher instructed that we(should) hand in our papers after class.
sentences.chinese: 老师命令我们下课后把试卷交上去。

sentences.english: Papers are sent to UCLES for marking.
sentences.chinese: 试卷被送往剑桥大学考试委员会打分。

sentences.english: Don't worry. There are no catch questions in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，试卷里没有怪题。

sentences.english: All the maths problems on the test paper are difficult, so that I couldn't work out them all.
sentences.chinese: 试卷上的所有数学试题都很难，以致于我都做不出来。

sentences.english: I have checked their papers and many, many of the students did very well.
sentences.chinese: 我已经批阅了他们的试卷，很多同学都做得很好。

sentences.english: A lot of people don't read the test.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都不会去阅读试卷。

sentences.english: Check your papers carefully before handing them in.
sentences.chinese: 在交卷之前，仔细检查你的试卷。

sentences.english: The instructor distributed the test papers to the students.
sentences.chinese: 教员把试卷分发给学生。

sentences.english: Your papers should be handed in before 10 .
sentences.chinese: 你们的试卷要在10点前交上来。

sentences.english: Test paper and answer sheet collected by NVT staff.
sentences.chinese: 考试结束，测试试卷和答题纸交给纳维员工。

sentences.english: We handed in our exams at the last minute of the class.
sentences.chinese: 在下课的最后时刻，我们交了考试卷。

sentences.english: A fuzzy mathematics method about whole pass judgment of examination paper .
sentences.chinese: 试卷整体评判的模糊数学方法。

sentences.english: You must give in your examination papers now.
sentences.chinese: 你们现在必须把你们的试卷交上来。

sentences.english: He looked at his examination paper sadly.
sentences.chinese: 他沮丧地看着自己的试卷。

definition: to correct student papers/to grade exam papers
see 考試卷|考试卷[kao3 shi4 juan4]
to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
